notesShort: This character outranges you. Play patient and allow them to expend mana without taking damage.
They are very vulnerable to you offstage if they don't pull Zoom from menu. Be ready to edgeguard them with Air Slash and D-Air.
You will take 40% if you get hit in Jump/Buster art. Beware.

With Zoom priming, Hero will almost always get Zoom offstage. He must be outside the camera bounds for the increased chance. You should opt to use B-Throw or U-Throw when he's at the percent where he can just zoom back.
Oomph + Psych up will break your shield.

usmash.notes: Catches roll, but he falls out of U-Smash 2

fsmash.notes: Precise spacing. Hits at a little less than roll distance from ledge.
